articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by N. Hamgyong Art Troupe
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by N. Hamgyong Art Troupe
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the North Hamgyong Provincial Art Troupe.
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC, O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Han Hung Phyo, chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and other leading officials of the province and main factories and enterprises.
					
					 The art troupe put on the stage such colorful numbers as female trio "Song of Mangyongdae", female folk solo "Hoeryong in Spring", song and dance "Cuckoo on Road to Front", dance "Flame at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex", female soprano "Socialist Land of Bliss", violin duet and pangchang "I'll Be the Flower to Herald Spring", violin ensemble "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology", mixed duet and chorus "Juche Iron Is the Best", female trio and chorus "Higher and Faster" and mixed quintet and chorus "Under the Banner of the Party".
					
					  After the performance was over, he waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the art troupe staged a splendid performance rich in its ideological contents and high in artistry with numbers of great cognitional and instructive value. He highly appreciated their success in the performance and extended thanks to them.   
					
					 He highly estimated the feats performed by the art troupe, noting that it has created a lot of art works rich in their ideological contents and high in artistry as required by the new century by steadily giving full play to the WPK's unique creative principle and style which were embodied in creating the five revolutionary operas and thus creditably discharged its mission and duty as a true creator and a steadfast defender of socialist culture and arts. 
					
					 It is the basic mission of the Juche-oriented arts to provide the people with a genuine idea, morality and genuine culture necessary for leading an independent life as human beings, he said, advancing the important tasks to be fulfilled to further develop the arts as required by the era of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Reiterates Will to Contribute to Building Better Asia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Reiterates Will to Contribute to Building Better Asia
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will fulfill its responsibility and role in opening a bright prospect for developing economy, environment and energy in an effort to make a positive contribution to the building of better Asia. Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, who is heading the WPK delegation said this in his speech at the 6th general meeting of the International Conference of Asian Political Parties on Dec. 2.
					 Referring to the importance of the development of economy, environment and energy at present in carving out a better future, he underscored the need to ensure socio-political stability in order to successfully solve this issue as required by the ideal of humankind.
					
					 Recalling that socio-political stability is fully ensured in the DPRK, he noted that the WPK set it as a primary important political task to protect environment and develop clean energy in building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 After giving a detailed account of the fact that the DPRK has directed great efforts to environmental protection, he declared that the WPK and the DPRK government would boost cooperation with international organizations and other countries in the efforts to settle the issue of global environmental protection and climate change.
					
					 Stable environment in the vicinity of the country presents itself as the most urgent issue at present in the WPK's activities for developing national economy and promoting the people's well-being, he said, adding that outsiders' interference and constant threat of the forces hostile to the DPRK persist on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity even in the 21st century after the demise of the Cold War.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by south Korea in perpetrating the recent provocations against the DPRK around Yonphyong Island, the sensitive waters along the maritime boundary line in the West Sea of Korea, was to make the public believe that the DPRK recognized the waters off Yonphyong Island as "territorial waters" of south Korea in case the former does not take any physical counter-action. The DPRK, however, has neither recognized them nor will do so in the future, too. 
					
					 Another aim sought by south Korea was to let the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington sail into the West Sea of Korea at any cost under the pretext of the above-said incident. In the final analysis, south Korea played the role of a marionette for its American master this time again.
					
					 Thanks to the WPK's Songun policy the danger of war is defused and peace ensured on the peninsula and the Korean people's cause of building a thriving nation has been successfully pushed ahead.
					
					 In closing, he expressed thanks to political parties of different countries for extending support and encouragement to the WPK and the Korean people in their just cause.

articles.title: KCNA Warns against US-S. Korean Puppet Group's Rash Acts
articles.content:
KCNA Warns against US-S. Korean Puppet Group's Rash Acts
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency is authorized to release Sunday the following report:
					 The south Korean puppet group, far from drawing a lesson from the deserved punishment it faced for its reckless firing of shells into the territorial waters of the DPRK side around Yonphyong Island, is getting more frantic in military provocations and war moves under this pretext.
					
					 The puppet group staged the largest-ever madcap combined exercises together with the U.S. in waters of the West Sea of Korea with its nuclear carrier flotilla involved right after the shelling incident on Yonphyong Island. It plans to stage large-scale combined naval maneuvers with huge armed forces of the U.S. Seventh Fleet including its nuclear submarines involved in the near future. 
					
					 It noisily announced that firing exercises would be staged at 29 places in the East, West and South seas of south Korea simultaneously from Monday.
					
					  Taechong Island, one of the five islands in the West Sea very close to the territory of the DPRK, is included in them.
					
					 The puppet forces are loudly advertising that they would fire shells into the territorial waters of the DPRK side from Yonphyong Island, i.e. in the same direction they did when committing the recent provocation. This indicates how frantic they have become in their provocative acts.
					
					  They are getting very busy massively introducing latest weapons including MLRS and missiles into Yonphyong Island to reinforce the fire power and installations and stage a take-shelter drill. 
					
					 The puppet military war-like forces were reported to have already worked out the so-called "retaliatory plan" which calls for sparking off an armed clash after getting on the nerves of the DPRK militarily and taking a large-scale counter-action under this pretext and designated Yonphyong Island as an ignition point to put it into practice.
					
					 This indicates that the Lee Myung Bak group is set to orchestrate the second Yonphyong Island incident at any cost and ignite a war come what may under this pretext.
					
					 The puppet group is so hell-bent on the moves to escalate the confrontation and start a war that it is recklessly behaving, bereft of reason. 
					
					 The war-like forces including the new puppet defence minister vociferated about the "principal enemy" and the like while daring take issue with even the leadership of the DPRK. They blustered that they would make a "precision strike" at artillery positions of the DPRK and "reduce them to ashes" by modifying the "rules for battles" and setting in motion all the war means including aircraft. They went the lengths of letting loose outbursts that they would use the defence positions on the five islands in the West Sea as springboards for attack from which to strike the strategic targets deep inside the territory of the DPRK including Pyongyang.
					
					 The frantic provocations on the part of the puppet group are rapidly driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an uncontrollable extreme phase.
					
					 No one can predict to what extent the situation will deteriorate in the future. 
					
					 The DPRK is now maintaining a maximum self-possession and self-control.
					
					 If an all-out war breaks out between the north and the south, it will seriously affect peace and security not only on the Korean Peninsula but in the rest of the region.
					
					 Public opinion at home and abroad and the parties concerned are called upon to pay a serious attention to the daily worsening situation on the peninsula and properly understand who is a provocateur and who is a defender of justice.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group would be well advised to stop acting rashly, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their reckless military provocation.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobatics "Fliers" Wins Gold Prize
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobatics "Fliers" Wins Gold Prize
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobatics "Fliers" won a gold prize, the highest prize, at the 9th Grenoble International Circus Festival.
					 The festival which was held in Grenoble City of France from Nov. 25 to 28 brought together famous circus organizations and acrobats of 11 countries including the DPRK, Russia, France, Italy and Ukraine.
					
					 In the acrobatic number DPRK acrobats presented in the air movements requiring high technique and superb skills. 
					
					 They were warmly cheered and acclaimed by spectators each time they displayed high skills.

articles.title: Member of S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Arrested
articles.content:
Member of S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Arreste
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police on Dec. 1 arrested the chief editor of the organ of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 The fascists committed such action after issuing summons to him to appear at the police station on charges of the violation of the "Law on Assembly and Demonstration" several times for the mere reason that he attended a press conference denouncing the puppet police for forcibly searching the office of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, etc. and walking off its leading members last year.
					
					 Not content with prosecuting him on charges of the violation of the notorious "National Security Law," asserting that he praised the north at rallies and conducted propaganda about the validity of the organization, the puppet police threw him into prison, calling into question his participation in the press conference.

articles.title: Actions for Repeal of Evil Law Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Repeal of Evil Law Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" held a press conference on Dec. 1, 62 years since the fascist law was fabricated.
					 The organization charged that this evil law, a virtual copy of the "Maintenance of the Public Order Act" during the Japanese imperialists' rule over Korea in the past, has earned ill-fame as a means for maintaining the power of the successive dictatorial regimes and a lever for suppressing the people's struggle for democratization.
					
					 The organization accused the authorities of having resorted to wiretapping, investigation, search, walking away, arrest, etc. by increasing the number of security machines and invoking the evil law since the candlelight actions of people of different circles against the import of the American beef infected mad cow disease.
					
					 The spearhead of suppression has always been directed to the democratic figures and progressive camp critical of the present regime, it noted, calling upon the people from all walks of life aspiring after democratization, human rights, equality, peace and reunification to pool their efforts to wage a dynamic struggle to get the NSL abolished.

articles.title: Finland-Korea Society Meets
articles.content:
Finland-Korea Society Meets
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Finland-Korea Society was held on Nov. 23.
					 At the meeting Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the society, referred to the prevailing situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The action orientation of the society was discussed at the meeting.
					
					 The society decided to widely introduce to the Finnish people the achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation, the time-honored history and brilliant culture of Korea and intensify its activities on the principle of promoting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries through multi-faceted exchange in 2011, too.
